message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.CY, cs.SI. 

This paper focuses on the security of blockchain systems, which is a topic that falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also involves mathematical modeling and analysis of the blockchain mining process, which could be categorized under distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). Additionally, the paper discusses the importance of confirmation depth and attacker mining power, which are relevant to network security (cs.NI) and cryptography (cs.CY). Finally, the paper presents an economic evaluation of the double-spend attack, which could be categorized under social and information networks (cs.SI).
